Element.Name: Specification identification
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.

Element.Name: Business process type identifier
Element.Description: Peppol: Identifies the BII profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.

Element.Name: Document identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: Material ticket number (T6329). Unique identity identifying the weight statement. Peppol: T6329. Unique identity identifying the weight statement.

Element.Name: Weight statement issue date
Element.Description: BEAst: Document date time (T6325). Peppol: T6325

Element.Name: Weight statement issue time
Element.Description: BEAst: Document date time (T6325). Peppol: T6325

Element.Name: Weight statement type code
Element.Description: BEAst: Document type (T6328). 01 = Outbound delivery 02 = Inbound delivery Peppol: T6328. 01 = Outbound delivery 02 = Inbound delivery

Element.Name: Sender information
Element.Description: Peppol: The party sending this weight statement (e.g. Weighing Station, Shipper, Freight Forwarder, Carrier, ...).

Element.Name: Sender electronic address
Element.Description: BEAst: Identity of the party sending this weight statement, T0009. Peppol:

Element.Name: Sender identity
Element.Description: BEAst: Identity of the party sending this weight statement, T0009. Peppol:

Element.Name: Sender name
Element.Description: BEAst: Name of the party sending this weight statement, T5001. Peppol:

Element.Name: Receiver information
Element.Description: Peppol: The party receiving this weight statement (e.g. Carrier, Terminal Operator, ...).

Element.Name: Receiver electronic address
Element.Description: BEAst: The ID of the party receiving this weight statement, T0008. Peppol:

Element.Name: Receiver identity
Element.Description: BEAst: The ID of the party receiving this weight statement, T0008. Peppol:

Element.Name: Receiver name
Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the party receiving this weight statement, T5001. Peppol:

Element.Name: Weighing party information
Element.Description: Peppol: The party executing the weight measure (e.g. Weighing Station).

Element.Name: Weighing party identity
Element.Description: BEAst: Identity of the party executing the weight measure (T6330). Peppol:

Element.Name: Weighing party name
Element.Description: BEAst: Name of the party executing the weight measure (T5001). Peppol: T5001

Element.Name: Location name Location identity
Element.Description: BEAst: City name (T5005) Peppol: T5005 T6755

Element.Name: Location name Location identity
Element.Description: BEAst: Site ID (T6755) Peppol: T5005 T6755

Element.Name: Shipper information
Element.Description: Peppol: The party transporting or shipping the items.

Element.Name: Shipper identity
Element.Description: BEAst: Identity of the Transport party (T3208/T6001). Peppol: T3208/T6001

Element.Name: Shipper name
Element.Description: BEAst: Name of the Transport party (T5001). Peppol: T5001

Element.Name: Shipment identity
Element.Description: Peppol: Use NA if no specific shipment ID is available

Element.Name: Line item identifier
Element.Description: BEAst: T0051 Identifies the Line Item assigned by the weighing partner, the identifier must be unique within the order Peppol: Identifies the Line Item assigned by the weighing partner, the identifier must be unique within the order

Element.Name: Gross weight
Element.Description: BEAst: T6122 (when T6714="AAD"). Weight (mass) of goods including packing but excluding the carrier's equipment. Peppol: T6122 (when T6714="AAD"). Weight (mass) of goods including packing but excluding the carrier's equipment.

Element.Name: Net weight
Element.Description: BEAst: T6122 (when T6714="AAA"). Weight of goods including any packaging that normally going with the goods. Peppol: T6122 (when T6714="AAA"). Weight of goods including any packaging that normally going with the goods.

Element.Name: Net net weight
Element.Description: BEAst: T6122 (when T6714="AAF"). Weight (mass) of goods without any packaging. Peppol: T6122 (when T6714="AAF"). Weight (mass) of goods without any packaging.

Element.Name: Gross volume
Element.Description: BEAst: T6122 (when T6714="AAW"). The volume unadjusted for factors such as temperature or gravity. Peppol: T6122 (when T6714="AAW"). The volume unadjusted for factors such as temperature or gravity.

Element.Name: Net volume
Element.Description: BEAst: T6122 (when T6714="AAX"). The volume after adjustment for factors such as temperature or gravity. Peppol: T6122 (when T6714="AAX"). The volume after adjustment for factors such as temperature or gravity.

Element.Name: Item description
Element.Description: BEAst: T6226. Description of weighed item Peppol: T6226. Description of weighed item
Element.Value: Sortering 0/2 mm krossat bergmaterial CE-märkt enligt system 2+ för användning till asfalt.

Element.Name: Buyers item identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0172 Supplier's article number (when T6317="BP"). Peppol: T0172 (when T6317="BP").

Element.Name: Sellers item identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0172 Supplier's article number (when T6317="SA"). Peppol: T0172 (when T6317="SA").

Element.Name: Standard item identification
Element.Description: BEAst: T0154 Global Trade Item Number. Peppol: T0172 (when T6317<>"SA"/"BP"). Only one Standard Item Number can be used per line.
